Description: Progress 2028, a fake Kamala Harris manifesto, has been used to distort the Democratic nominee's policies on social media, in a bod to sway voters.

Title: Turkey seeks deeper Africa ties, more Gaza support at summit
Description: Turkish FM Hakan Fidan headed a summit in which numerous African nations were present, in a bid to deepen ties with the continent.

Title: Israeli army destroyed around 12% of Lebanese border villages
Description: Some of the worst affected areas in recent weeks include Odaisseh, where 20 percent of buildings have been damaged, including a historic cultural centre.

Title: UK academic files torture complaint against UAE Interpol chief
Description: The UAE's most senior police official is already facing a criminal probe in France and is attending the Interpol annual meeting in Glasgow this week.

Title: Bangladeshi worker killed by Israeli air strike in Beirut
Description: Bangladeshi national Mohammad Nizam was killed on Saturday in an strike on Beirut as he stopped at a coffee shop as he headed to work, his family said.

Title: Rashida Tlaib declines to endorse Harris for US presidency
Description: The Palestinian-American representative urged union workers to get out and vote, but stopped short of endorsing the vice president.

Title: Israeli forces detain 16 Palestinians, 'brand detainees in WB'
Description: Israeli forces killed at least five Palestinians and arrested 16 others in the occupied West Bank on Friday, while carrying out incursions on several towns.

Title: Strike hits Gaza vaccination centre, wounding four children
Description: Israel's military has denied the strike that struck a north Gaza vaccination centre, which wounded six people including four children.

Title: Israeli MK fired from combat role due to misconduct in Lebanon
Description: Israeli lawmaker Yitzhak Kroizer was dismissed after being photographed in a south Lebanon home, with graffiti behind him reading ‘office of MK Kroizer’.

Title: Israeli strikes kill more than 30 across Gaza Strip
Description: Sunday saw at least 31 Palestinians killed across the Gaza Strip, specifically in the territory's north and Khan Younis, while Israel continue to pound Lebanon.

Title: Israel strikes Gaza, as UN warns of 'imminent risk of dying'
Description: Strikes across Gaza and Lebanon continued on Sunday, after the UN warned that Palestinians in the north are at 'an imminent risk of dying'.

Title: Palestinian detainees 'not informed' of family deaths by Israel
Description: Israeli prisons have been deliberately withholding news of relatives passing away from Palestinian detainees, amid an increase of abuse against prisoners.

Title: Deadly Israeli strikes on 'apocalyptic' north Gaza
Description: Israel's full-on assault on north Gaza continued on Saturday, with the UN calling conditions 'apocalyptic', as Israel also continues striking Lebanon.

Title: Yemen's Houthis get 'unprecedented' military support: UN report
Description: Yemen's Houthi rebels have been able to build a powerful military apparatus due to outside support from Iran and Hezbollah.

Title: Hamas, Fatah delegations in Cairo for Gaza 'day after' talks
Description: Hamas has reportedly said it is open to solutions proposed by Fatah and the PA, but expects Israel to obstruct any agreement reached.

Title: Gaza war: Over 100 staff accuse BBC of Israel bias in coverage
Description: In the letter, staff members accused the BBC of failing to carry out 'accurate and evidence-based' journalism when reporting on Israel's war in Gaza.

Title: US announces new Mideast military deployments in warning to Iran
Description: The US has deployed additional military assets to the Middle East in an attempt to deter Iran from retaliating against Israel's aggression.

Title: Turkey's Erdogan sues Istanbul's opposition mayor for slander
Description: Turkish president Recep Tayyip Erdogan has filed a lawsuit against Istanbul's mayor, a member of the opposition CHP.

Title: Israel raids West Bank towns as settlers threaten olive harvest
Description: Israeli forces carried out raids on several towns in the occupied West Bank, as settlers threatened farmers harvesting olives.

Title: Lebanese man 'abducted' in 'suspected Israeli naval operation'
Description: A naval commando force, suspected to belong to Israel, has abducted a Lebanese man in broad daylight in the coastal city of Batroun.

Title: Kemi Badenoch becomes new leader of UK Conservatives
Description: Kemi Badenoch has become the new leader of the UK Conservative Party, vowing to return the party to its principles and to power.

Title: Israeli strikes continue to pound Lebanon, kill 50 in Baalbek
Description: Lebanon's Baalbek witnessed another massacre on Friday, where over 50 people were killed in overnight strikes across the district's villages.

Title: Khamenei vows response to attacks on Iran and allies
Description: Iran's supreme leader Ali Khamenei has said his country will retaliate against the Israeli attack of 1 October, also laying blame on the US.

Title: Israel kills 55 people in Gaza, bombs child vaccination clinic
Description: Israeli forces have killed at least 55 in Gaza in the last 24hours, while bombing a vaccination clinic, injuring three Palestinian children.

Title: Gaza: Israeli forces kill 84, including dozens of children
Description: Northern Gaza is reeling after Israel carried out 'brutal massacres' in Jabalia, while Israel continues its deadly bombardment of Lebanon.

Title: Trump, Harris clash over rhetoric as they battle for swing state votes
Description: More than 68 million Americans have already cast their ballots ahead of Election Day on Tuesday. Opinion polls show Trump and Harris running dead even

Title: N. Gaza 'apocalyptic,' everyone at 'imminent risk' of death: UN
Description: UN officials have warned that everything in the northern Gaza Strip was at 'imminent risk' of dying as a result of Israel's continued offensive in the area

Title: Secret Service report offers new details on failures during Trump assassination attempt
Description: The internal review released Friday is the latest in a list of reports and investigations into the July 13 shooting at a Trump rally in Pennsylvania

Title: Algeria marks 70 years since start of independence war with France
Description: Algeria marked the 70th anniversary of the launch of its war for independence from France with a military parade on Friday

Title: Morocco rights activist freed but still faces prosecution
Description: Morocco's public prosecutor on Friday decided to release a rights activist two days after his detention, but to initiate proceedings against him

Title: Egypt activists urge government to seize Israel bound arms ship
Description: Egyptian activists urge government to seize Israel bound arms ship MV Kathrin after docking in Alexandria

Title: UN chief 'appalled' by paramilitary violence in Sudan: spokesman
Description: The UN's chief has condemned recent attacks by Sudanese paramilitaries in Al-Jazira state, as the conflict there rages on
